@Joe90_Jen @Truefubar @yeeboiil @ladbible You must give your own arse a headache eh, cause mine is starting to hurt and I’ve only had to read 4 or 5 messages. You’ve got to deal with that daily. Fuck that.

@Joe90_Jen @Truefubar @yeeboiil @ladbible Gilroy is my surname, is that ok with with you ‘Sunset’, or is it ‘Bonkette’
Hold on, I genuinely don’t give a shit. Goodbye.

@Truefubar @yeeboiil @Joe90_Jen @ladbible I’m all for giving someone my seat if they need it more than me, I was simply pointing out being blind doesn’t always mean you need a seat. Next thing you know I’m a cunt. Superb like.

@Truefubar @yeeboiil @Joe90_Jen @ladbible Did you not know that people with arthritis walk about with a big sign on their head telling you so Wendy? They also use a megaphone to let everyone know about it as well just to cover all bases.
@Joe90_Jen @yeeboiil @ladbible Good for you, I have a blind friend. He doesn’t require a seat above anyone else.
@ladbible Didn’t realise your legs stopped working when your blind
